thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Maxime Lopez set to sign new Marseille deal | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Maxime Lopez set to sign new Marseille deal | Metro News

author: Metro Sport Reporter For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Maxime Lopez set to sign new Marseille deal | Metro News
text:
Arsenal and Chelsea target Maxime Lopez set to sign new four-year Marseille deal gossip Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 6:53 pm Lopez has been linked with a move to the Premier League (Picture: Getty) 
Maxime Lopez is set to put end to speculation surrounding his future by signing a new four-year deal with Marseille. 
The 19-year-old is one of Europe’s hottest prospects and he’s enjoyed a fine season in Ligue 1. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
After scoring once and providing four assists from midfield in 15 starts, Lopez has found himself being linked with a move to the Premier League, with Arsenal and Chelsea believed to be very keen on landing him. 
But the Frenchman is set to stick with Marseille and put pen to paper on a new long-term deal, according for RMC Sport.
